channel.title: What-to-Use on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in What-to-Use on Ksbigbass

item.title: Bolts to Add a Jackplate 519vx
item.description:
Bolts to Add on a Jackplate to Ranger 519vx

Bolts to Add a Jackplate Ranger 519vx: Since I have the out for a rebuild I’ve decided to add a jackplate to the Ranger. Jackplate’s offer adjustability to the motor height and in turn the height of the prop shaft.

item.title: Sonar Units Truly are Becoming Fish Finders!
item.description:
Sonar Units Truly are Becoming Fish Finders! I thought a Lowrance sonar video set would be appropriate for the blog this week.  Headed to Stockton Lake, Mo for this years championship.

This is a 2 day event on a lake I have never been to before but know it’s been off limits for the past 30 days so no one else should have been either.  A lake this size and only 20 boats that made the championship, and the bumper boat session of last months small pond fiasco isn’t gonna happen!

item.title: What about the Stalkers KVD?
item.description:
What about the Stalkers KVD?

 Great Video where KVD talks about using a topwater popper!

May is a great time to start throwing topwater baits, start in 60 degree surface water temp and I always start with a Pop-r.

https://youtu.be/i-lA3KkqES0

This video is such a great piece of info from one of the best.

But one big thing I think KVD fails to mention in this video is to watch for stalkers!

item.title: Buzzbait conditions
item.description:
Buzzbait conditions: The conditions were perfect for a buzzbait bite — post-frontal with a nice chop on the water, just enough to break up the profile of my bait. It was a textbook presentation.

I want the bass to eat topwater baits but I am not sure the conditions will allow, but if it does….Wow!

Buzzbait conditions:

When to:

Low skies, low light, and a slightly cooler day than you’ve been having, the topwater bite turns on

item.title: TOP LURES FOR MARCH: Top 50 Lure Rankings
item.description:

item.title: Underspin: Here's a better look
item.description:
Underspin. Here’s a better look. Turns out I was ahead of the curve on this one.

Casey Ashley won the Bassmaster Classic on a very similar bait.

item.title: Boat Towing Gas Savers!
item.description:
Boat Towing Gas Savers: It’s important to keep the rig rolling down the road.  Small things I do that can help keep a couple dollars in my pocket.

You hear it all the time to check your tire pressure.  

But make Sure and Check the SPARE on both the tow and boat!!

item.title: Missed a Big One
item.description:
Missed a Big One: Hit a local yocal today and found quite a few Big bucks running the bank.   Had about 20 min to fish, so I had to make the best of it.

Targeting spawning flats

Started with a custom painted Pop-r and had a nice 8 lber blow up on it.  Being my first cast of the day I choked and yanked it out of his mouth !  ARGH!!  Missed a Big One!
